name: YourExpertLog
0:
”Alexa, open Your Expert Log”
”Log an expert”
”Find an expert”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your expert log
des:
Your Expert Log is a skill that enables you to record people that your friends mention who are experts in different services that you may need in the future. They may be handymen, painters, dentists, lawyers or doctors that your friends have used and recommend. For instance, when your toilet starts to leak & you need a plumber fast, wouldn’t it be easier to ask Your Expert Log than trying to remember the name of that plumber your friend Joe had told you about three months earlier? 

Our friends often recommend experts who have provided reliable, outstanding services. The problem is being able to recall the name of the expert or who made the recommendation when we need that skill. It could be a house painter or a cardiologist. With Your Expert Log, you log the expert soon after you hear your friend’s recommendation. Then, whenever you need someone with that skill you can ask Your Expert Log to tell you the experts in that skill category. The five categories are Health, Home, Legal, Finance, and Other.
With Your Expert Log you can:
1. Log an expert
2. Find an expert by searching one of the five categories of experts, or
3. Delete an expert

After using Your Expert Log for a while, you’ll wonder how you ever got along without it!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
